entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
